src:
Calon Tunggal, Surya Paloh Dipastikan Mulus Jadi Ketum Periode 2019-2024
06 Nov 2019, 17:49 by syariful alam


Calon Tunggal, Surya Paloh Dipastikan Mulus Jadi Ketum Periode 2019-2024

KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Umum Partai Nasdem Surya Paloh dipastikan akan kembali jadi ketua umum Partai Nasdem periode 2019-2024. Sekjen Partai Nasdem Jhonny Plate yang juga Menteri Kominfo mengatakan belum ada nama lain calon ketua umum yang mencuat selain Surya Paloh."Hingga hari ini Partai Nasdem masih merekam aspirasi daerah. Dan Hingga hari ini aspirasi kader daerah masih dominan mengharapkan agar Surya Paloh yang ketum saat ini untuk melanjutkan kepemimpinannya," kata Jhonny di Kantor DPP Partai Nasdem, Gondangdia, Jakarta Pusat, Rabu (6/11/2019).Pada dasarnya, lanjut Jhonny, Nasdem bersifat sangat terbuka kepada siapa pun kader yang berkompeten dan ingin mencalonkan diri sebagai ketua umum. Nantinya, semua proses akan dilakukan dalam arena kongres, baik pleno maupun rapat komisinya.Ketua OC Kongres II yang juga Ketua DPP Bidang Perempuan dan Anak, Amelia Anggraini, menjelaskan, dalam kongres ke-II Nasdem, peserta yang sudah mendaftar saat ini sudah mencapai angka lebih dari 7.000 orang. Di dalam kongres pun, akan diundang Presiden Joko Widodo dan para Ketua Umum Parpol. Untuk Presiden, Wapres dan Ketua Umum Parpol akan diundang pada penutupan pada tanggal 11 November.Dijelaskan, pada pembukaan kongres ke-II Nasdem rencananya tidak akan mengundang tokoh maupun pejabat partai politik. Hanya saja, Nasdem mempercayakan pembukaan kongres kepada Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan selaku tuan rumah.
text:
Single Candidate, Surya Paloh Confirmed Seamlessly Becomes Ketum 2019-2024 Period
Nov 06 2019, 17:49 by syariful alam


Single Candidate, Surya Paloh Confirmed Seamlessly Becomes Ketum 2019-2024 Period

KBRN, Jakarta: Chairperson of the Nasdem Party Surya Paloh is certain to return to being the general chair of the Nasdem Party in the 2019-2024 period. Nasdem Party Secretary General Jhonny Plate, who is also the Minister of Communication and Information Technology, said that there was no other nominee for the chairmanship candidate other than Surya Paloh. "To this day the Nasdem Party is still recording regional aspirations. This is to continue his leadership, "said Jhonny at the Nasdem Party DPP Office, Gondangdia, Central Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Basically, continued Jhonny, Nasdem was very open to anyone cadres who were competent and wanted to run for chairman general. Later, all processes will be carried out in the arena of the congress, both plenary and commission meetings. OC Chairman of the Second Congress who is also the Chairperson of the DPP for Women and Children, Amelia Anggraini, explained, in Nasdem's Second Congress, participants who had registered at this time had reached the number more than 7,000 people. Even in the congress, President Joko Widodo and Political Party Chairmen will be invited. For the President, the Vice President and the General Chairman of the Political Party will be invited at the closing on November 11. Explained, at the opening of the 2nd congress Nasdem planned not to invite figures or political party officials. However, Nasdem entrusted the opening of the congress to DKI Governor Anies Baswedan as the host.
